sentences.en: And the high speed motorized spindle is its heart part.
sentences.cn: 而高速电主轴单元则是高速机床的心脏部件.

sentences.en: Because she is literally nothing but skin and bone, all call her Spindle - shanks.
sentences.cn: 手脚瘦得象芦柴棒一样, 于是大家就拿“芦柴棒”当了她的名字.

sentences.en: Drum is the key component of level spindle - type cotton picker.
sentences.cn: 采棉滚筒是水平摘锭 式 采棉机的核心部件.

sentences.en: Imported spindle bearings featuring in high running speed high precision.
sentences.cn: 主轴轴承采用进口轴承,高转速,高精度.

sentences.en: In these cells, one's attention is drawn to the spindle pole, its nature, and function.
sentences.cn: 在这些细胞中, 纺锤极的性质和功能是值得注意的.

sentences.en: Long believed to exist only in the brains of humans and other great apes, in 2006 spindle cells were discovered in the same brain areas in humpback whales, fin whales, killer whales, and sperm whales.
sentences.cn: 长久以来梭形细胞被认为只存在于人类和其他类人猿的大脑中，直到2006梭形细胞也在座头鲸、长须鲸、虎鲸和抹香鲸大脑的同样区域上被发现。

sentences.en: Screw hollow and motor spindle are distributed staggered and equally.
sentences.cn: 螺纹安装孔的位置与电装电机轴线成错开对称分布.

sentences.en: Spindle - shanks is anxiously watching a pan of congee , till the smoke makes her start coughing violently.
sentences.cn: “芦柴棒”着急地要将大锅子里的稀饭烧滚, 但是倒冒出来的青烟引起了她一阵猛烈的咳嗽.

sentences.en: The cage is connected by a spindle to the torque spring and pointer.
sentences.cn: 用销子将其骨架结构与转矩弹簧和指针连接.

sentences.en: The layer spindle was an early development.
sentences.cn: 层式纺锤形是早期发展起来的.

sentences.en: The plane of cell division is, in turn, determined by the orientation of the mitotic spindle.
sentences.cn: 细胞分裂的方向又是由有丝分裂的纺锤体所确定.

sentences.en: The spindle method of training apple and pear trees was developed in Germany in the 1930's.
sentences.cn: 苹果和梨的纺锤形整枝方法,是三十年代在德国发展起来的.

sentences.en: The thread needs to be wound around the spindle.
The wiper of the potentiometer is connected directly to the spindle.
sentences.cn: 电位计的孤刷直接与销子连接.

sentences.en: This is an ideal spindle tree system.
sentences.cn: 这是一种理想的纺锤形植株方式.

sentences.en: When lying between connective tissue fibers, fibroblasts are generally elongated and spindle shaped.
sentences.cn: 当它位于结缔组织纤维间时, 纤维细胞一般呈长形及梭形.

words.tran_cn: 轴；[细胞]纺锤，[纺]锭子；细长的人或物

phrases.tran_cn: 梭形细胞；纺锤细胞；纺锤形细胞

trans.tran_cn: 锭子的，锭子似的；细长的
纺锤，纱锭，轴，细长的人或物，[生]纺锤体
trans.tran_en: a part of a machine shaped like a stick, around which something turns
